description:
Ekoda-chan is a girl in her twenties struggling to make ends meet while enjoying life. After being taken on a tour through her routine, stay for a discussion between the director of episode 1, Daichi Akitaro (Kodomo no Omocha, Now and There Here and Then, Sexy Commando) and it`s star, former AKB48 member Ishida Haruka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Daichi Akitarou x Ishida Haruka
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 1 - Daichi Akitaro x Ishida Haruka
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 大地丙太郎 x 石田晴香
